pr_title: [MINOR] Add description to remind users that Hudis docker images have mounted the projects workspace

timeline.bodyText:
Reword To :  "As these docker containers have mounted local HUDI workspace, any changes that happen in the workspace would automatically reflect in the  containers. This is a convenient way for developing and verifying Hudi for
developers who do not own a distributed environment. Note that this is how integration tests are run."
